name: COMMONWEALTH ex rel. Ricky TEJADA, Appellant v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary, Department of Corrections, et al., Appellees
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Tejada v. Beard

parties: COMMONWEALTH ex rel. Ricky TEJADA, Appellant v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary, Department of Corrections, et al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of March, 2010, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

COMMONWEALTH ex rel. Ricky TEJADA, Appellant v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary, Department of Corrections, et al., Appellees.
